issue.title: [C++] Add scalar string join kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10959](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10959). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to Python's str.join

For example, if the separator were `"-"`, this takes input:
```Java

ListArray<list<item: string>>
[
  ["foo","bar"],
  ["push","pop"]
]
```
and returns output:
```Java

Array<string>
[ 
  "foo-bar",
  "push-pop"
] 
```
